actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Nicholas Hipolito Valencia, his wife Blanca D. Trivino de Valencia, and their children Carlos A. Valencia and Javier Valencia.

summary.text: Declares four named individuals to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Nicholas Hipolito Valencia, his wife Blanca D. Trivino de Valencia, and their children Carlos A. Valencia and Javier Valencia.
